name: Sodor Jam 2023 "metroidvania
description:
Sodor Game Jam 2023, theme was Metrovannia, had the whole month of March, but decided to join the last 2 days. Spent under 60 hours working on this project as a whole, will definitely turn into a full game one day

Disclaimer: No Audio, and background Environment might cause Motion Sickness, Please double check on self care.

*note: hit box is funky and you might get hit when you shouldnt have*
